body: I am assuming the Graph doesn't have any inplace operators. What we can do later is optimize the instruction generation to re-use inputs tensors when an inplace variant exists and it is safe to do (no more uses, not ruining a constant). Copying constants can potentially add huge overhead, so it makes sense to stick with working with the fast path.
